content:
Diagnosis:	Locally advanced gastric cancer - poorly cohesive carcinoma, stage T3N2M0, MSI-high, EBV positive.

Initial treatment with perioperative FLOT chemotherapy commenced January 2024. Completed 4 cycles pre-operative chemotherapy with good radiological response. Underwent total gastrectomy on 15 April 2024 with D2 lymphadenectomy.

Pathology confirmed ypT2N1(2/15) poorly cohesive carcinoma, R0 resection. Commenced post-operative FLOT May 2024.

Seen today prior to cycle 3 of post-operative chemotherapy. Tolerating treatment well with only grade 1 fatigue and mild peripheral neuropathy. Weight stable at 72kg. Performance status remains 0. Blood results satisfactory for proceeding with treatment.

Examination shows well-healed surgical scars. No concerning clinical findings.

Plan to proceed with cycle 3 post-operative FLOT today. Will arrange CT scan after completion of adjuvant treatment. Review in 3 weeks prior to cycle 4.

cancer_timeline.value: Pathology ypT2N1(2/15) poorly cohesive carcinoma, R0 resection

patient_facts.value: Grade 1 fatigue and mild peripheral neuropathy
Well-healed surgical scars, no concerning clinical findings

status_updates.value: Locally advanced gastric cancer post surgery, currently receiving adjuvant FLOT chemotherapy with good tolerance
Grade 1 fatigue and mild peripheral neuropathy
CT scan to be arranged after completion of adjuvant treatment
Review in 3 weeks prior to cycle 4
